# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.2.6   | :heavy_check_mark: |
| 1.2.x   | :x:                |
| < 1.2.0 | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

For minor security issues, please consider opening an issue. For more severe security issues, please consider writing an email.
